channel.title: ~~~(( LunarScape Development Team ))~~~
channel.description:
:eek: so if u would like to sign up to be on r development team plz do the following :eek: hamachi- lunarscape1-10 ( cap- L and S ) pass- 123 im not saying ip dnt want to break RULES!
name: ( game name ) job: (such as coder ) experience: ( have u been emplored on other servers such as admin or mod ) what sort of person r u: ( nice, bade, aggresive, dumb ) how many hrs a day u on: ( need to be 3-6 )
( i give u a number such as 00190-just employed 01900-1 week 19000-1 mounth 99999- over 1 mount and 1 day )
--jobs-- -coder -co owner -secuity -object add -spec add -mod -forum mod -admin -forum admin -forum co owner -compiler manger -employment manger -editor -grafics creator -pic creator
--mods-- ---compile manger--- i ko ok i none none none none none none
--admin-- ---pic creator--- odarn me bavzbest i ko ok i none bavzbest none none
--forum mod-- ---object add--- none none none none none none
--forum admin-- ---employment--- none me none none none none
--owner-- ---editor-- i ownd u i me none
--co owner-- ---coder--- bavzbest me none none ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ many thanks to all those ppl who helps me ( PICS ADDED SOON )
thank you--- i ownd u i --- ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ if you know any thing about ---::UPDATE CODE + AS KNOWN AS TEXT CODES PLZ TELL --- ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ i need to know how to take screen shots becasue ( i had a comp now got laptop ) :cool: :rolleyes: :cool:[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 18, 2008, 05:08:17 PM[/size][hr]also if you have any problems with compiles ( i have same ) so best thing to do is get someone else to do for you ;)
--- i ownd u i ---
p.s ( thread now open + need someone to do my compiler )
--- co owner --- bavzbest
